titleStmt.title: The Passion sermon preached at Paules Crosse, on Good-Friday. Apr. 14. 1609. By I.H.
Passion-sermon
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. S[tansby] for Samuell Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the Signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with E. Edgar's name in the imprint (STC 12694).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the Signe of the Bull-head
